about.description-bottom: I constantly wonder how to improve our present, to make our future better, particularly thanks to the advancements in computer science.

paragraphs.title: Developer Full Stack
paragraphs.description:
My priority is to craft intuitive user experiences (UX), that meet the needs of the users in the most efficient way possible.
Mainly focused on the development of Web solutions.
I am also interested in mobile and desktop application development, among other areas within the field of computer science.

paragraphs.title: Open-Source Enthusiast
paragraphs.description:
I value the sharing of knowledge and collaboration to collectively resolve problems.
The source code of the website is available on GitHub.

items.title: Carolo
items.description: Strategy board game similar to chess which allows grandiose moves (only available in French).

items.title: Leon
items.description: Leon is your open-source personal assistant.

open-source.description: List of most famous open source projects I contributed to.
